title: this is the only forum that i respect regarding league of legends
body:
people here are conflictive and always critizicism each other, and thats exaclt why i respect GD. they are not a bunch of hive mind that kiss riot ass and whenever they fuck up, GD is not afraid to point at them.

whenever you are shitposting or plain complaining, you actually are giving an insight of what you consider to be appropiate in this LoL, even if riot doesnt listen to every single one of you, never let your opinion go unheard.
